Name: Grandfather's Gift Remade
Author: pepoluan
Description: A remade of the Grandfather's Gift mod on NexusMods

Meta:Changelog.1.2.0: Fix un-pickup-able chest; add option to have weapon not added immediately to chest
Meta:Changelog.1.2.1: Fix crash due to too-early Dispose()
Meta:Changelog.1.2.4: Change weapon log to Info level; suppress warning of unused const
Meta:Changelog.1.2.5: Revert skipping mod after triggered once because state is game-wide instead of per-save
Meta:Changelog.1.3.0: Set positioning based on marriage state, code cleanup+modernization & Only trigger before set date.
